title: SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKCanvasView draws SKPicture pixelated when scaled up.
body:
Hi,

we use a custom MapControl for Zooming and Panning it's Content. It contains a SKCanvasView inside, which draws a SKPicture vector graphic. When the user zooms in, the MapControl increases the scale property of the SKCanvasView and the drawn Picture becomes bigger as expected. The Problem is that the Picture is pixelated although it should be scalable without pixelation as it's a vector graphic. I can provide Code or a sample solution if needed.

Thanks in advance for your help!
